channel.title: Laptop failing to start
channel.description:
Iv got a laptop were I load it up the bios and all loads fine but when it comes to actually loading windows or anything its just a blank screen.
I tried reinstalling windows from a disk and from a USB but it didnt seem to do anything as when I tried booting it all I would get is a blank screen. I did a diagnose which showed I have a corrupt Hard Drive. I tried installing windows onto a portal USB but I'm still getting a blank screen. I can access bios fine tho :/
Any ideas? I don't really want to be spending money on fixing it or getting a new hard drive.
edit: threw it away LOL

item.title: Laptop failing to start
item.dc:creator: @Hash1 Hash1
item.description:
@Hash1 wrote:

Can you access the Windows setup? If no, try going in BIOS and changing boot order so it boots from CD/USB.

Read full topic

item.description:

did you boot from the usb on another PC to make sure that the install took on the usb? You do have the option to boot from usb in your bios right?
